title: Sawaari (2016)
overview: The lives of a mad serial killer, an ACP who is just hours from his marriage and an unemployed youngster tasked with delivering a serviced vintage Contessa car to a superstitious MLA, intersect under coincidental circumstances leading to a classic cat and mouse tale!
storyline: The film is a psycho-thriller based on a travel experience that includes a lot of thrilling events and incidents. It features three contradicting characters a cop, a psycho and a driver that are headed to different destinations on this journey.
